sections.title: ğŸ“Œ Data Collection
content: We collect only the necessary personal information to provide our services.
Collected items include:
- Email address
- Usage logs
- API tokens for third-party integrations (e.g., Notion, GitHub, Vercel)

sections.title: ğŸ” Purpose of Use
content: Personal data is used for:
- Login and user authentication
- Personalized service features such as template copying and site creation
- Error tracking and customer support
- Statistical analysis and service improvements

sections.title: ğŸ”’ Retention & Protection
content: Data is retained according to the minimum retention period required by relevant laws and is promptly destroyed upon user deletion request or account termination.
Data may be transferred overseas through external services such as Vercel (USA) and GitHub (USA).
We implement the following measures:
- Encryption and secure storage
- Access control and authentication
- Security checks and audits
Trusted service providers: AWS, Vercel, GitHub, etc.

sections.title: ğŸ‘¤ User Rights
content: Users have the right to:
- Request access, correction, or deletion
- Request processing suspension
Requests will be processed within 30 days.

sections.title: ğŸª Cookies & Tracking
content: We use cookies to enhance user experience.
Users can control cookie settings via browser preferences.

sections.title: ğŸ“œ Contact & Responsibility
content: For inquiries, please contact:
ğŸ“§ contact@logme.dev

sections.title: ğŸ‘¶ Children's Privacy
content: Children under the age of 14 cannot use the service without parental consent.
